product_overview: Co-Ventures is a premium real estate investment platform aimed at democratizing access to institutional-grade real estate investments through co-ownership models. It leverages advanced AI to provide investment insights and a comprehensive suite of features including detailed property listings, subscription plans, an AI investment committee, and an integrated admin panel. The platform targets experienced investors, NRIs, and first-time investors seeking trustworthy, transparent, and intelligent real estate investment opportunities.
core_goals: Establish Co-Ventures as the most trusted platform for real estate investment by providing disciplined underwriting and transparent processes.
Lower barriers to entry for premium property investment through fractional co-ownership models.
Deliver AI-powered investment guidance and insights comparable to institutional research.
Enable complete visibility into investment performance, documentation, and market dynamics.
Provide a seamless, responsive, and pleasant user experience across all device types.
Drive growth through subscription monetization and comprehensive property and user management via an intuitive admin panel.
key_features: Comprehensive 13-section public Home Page including property search, featured listings, AI investment committee, testimonials, blog insights, and CTAs.
Robust Property Management with searchable listings, filtering, detailed property views including specs, amenities, developer info, and enquiry forms.
Multi-modal User Authentication supporting email, phone (OTP), and OAuth providers such as Google.
AI Investment Committee featuring 6 specialized agents providing market pulse, underwriting, verification, compliance, exit optimization and synthesized recommendations.
4-tier Subscription System integrated with Razorpay for payments, featuring tiered AI access, property saving limits, and export capabilities.
User Profile and Dashboard with saved properties, investment history, notifications, and subscription status.
Real-time Notification System with in-app alerts and email preferences.
Admin Dashboard with analytics, user and property management, inquiry tracking, blog and testimonial CMS, and AI configuration management.
Highly responsive and accessible UI components styled with Tailwind CSS, enhanced by Framer Motion animations and Radix UI components.
Content Management for blogs, testimonials, newsletters, FAQs, and static pages including legal and informational content.
user_flow_summary: Visitors land on a rich Home Page with multiple sections guiding them to explore properties or contact the team.
Users can search, filter, and browse property listings with options to save favorites (limitations based on subscription).
Detailed property pages provide immersive media, specs, investment metrics, and an enquiry form contextualized to the property.
Registered users authenticate via multiple methods and access personalized dashboards for profile management, saved properties, notifications, and AI assistant functionalities.
Subscribers leverage AI analyses from the 6-agent committee to inform investment decisions; free users have limited or no AI access.
Users manage subscriptions, upgrade plans, and make payments through Razorpay integration in their dashboard.
Admins access a comprehensive backend panel to manage properties, users, enquiries, content, and AI configurations with analytics monitoring.
validation_criteria: All 13 Home Page sections render correctly and responsively across devices with expected animations and CTAs operational.
Search filters and property listings return correct, paginated results with proper sort and save-to-favorites capability.
Authentication flows (registration, login, password reset) function securely with Firebase and session management.
AI Investment Committee agents produce accurate, actionable analysis outputs consistent with input data and subscription tiers.
Subscription system processes payments successfully and updates user access rights accordingly.
User profiles display accurate saved properties, notifications are received real-time and can be marked read/unread.
Admin panel functions for CRUD operations on properties, users, enquiries, and blog content with appropriate role restrictions.
Performance targets (FCP <1.5s, API p95 <500ms) and 99.9% uptime are met under test conditions.
Accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 AA) are met with keyboard navigation and screen reader support.
Security features including HTTPS, data encryption, rate limiting and compliance requirements are verified through penetration tests and audits.
